_comment: Ban items by type using prefixes: 'song:', 'artist:', 'album:', 'genre:'. Case insensitive matching.

_examples.song: song:Hello Kitty - bans only this specific song
_examples.artist: artist:Bad Artist - bans all songs by this artist
_examples.album: album:Bad Album - bans all songs from this album
_examples.genre: genre:hip hop - bans all songs with this genre
